vibesExplanation:
The workout 'Gentle Restorative Yoga' has strong elements of "The Zen Flow." "The Deep Recharge" is also applicable due to the restorative nature mentioned in the workout type, indicating a focus on resetting the body. The short duration (6 minutes) aligns with a quick recharge session, providing a brief yet refreshing experience.

There is high confidence in classifying these vibes due to the explicit mention of restorative and gentle elements in the metadata.
